Author: weetbbix
Text: i'm pretty sure you've heard this before (and i'm not saying this to invalidate your hurt feelings bcs I WOULD BE HURT TOO if someone started keeping distance from me bcs of my weight gain) BUT  i really hope you find people who support/love/want to be with you for reasons more interesting & important that how your body looks. because i'm sure there are many more amazing parts of you besides a flat stomach that are worth loving & appreciating!!!  hope you get out of this toxic environment & find good, supportive people to surround yourself with v v soon 💛 and if you're recovering, you're already doing an incredible, difficult thing. so take it easy on yourself ok 👏💪💛
